core:messageResource.core:message: POS Wastage
Add Item
Quantity Wastage
Void Product
Void Transaction
Complete Transaction
Cannot complete transaction. Please contact your system administrator.
Cannot add item. Please contact your system administrator.
Selected item is not perishable. Please select a perishable item.
{%=getLocalisedString(product.productDescription,userLocale.locale)} is not perishable. Item has not been added to the basket.
Product Wastage
** Product Wastage **
Please select the items for wastage.
Please select a reason code
Please select a reason code for {%=getLocalisedString(product.productDescription,userLocale.locale)}
Do you want to apply the same reason to the other scale items?
Loyalty card not valid in a product wastage transaction
Start Product Wastage Transaction
The user can start product wastage transactions
Authorises Product Wastage Transaction
The user can authorise product wastage transactions
Allow quantity greater than 99 in quantity wastage
The user is allowed to use quantity higher than 99 in quantity wastage
Authorises Void Product Wastage Item
The user can authorise product wastage item voids
Void Product Wastage Items Allowed
The user can void product wastage items
Authorises Void Product Wastage Transaction
The user can authorise voids for product wastage transactions
Void Product Wastage Transaction Allowed
The user can void the whole product wastage transaction
